metadata.title: CVE-2021-32840 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: SharpZipLib (or #ziplib) is a Zip, GZip, Tar and BZip2 library. Prior toversion 1.3.3, a TAR file entry `../evil.txt` may be extracted in theparent directory of `destFolder`. This leads to arbitrary file write thatmay lead to code execution. The vulnerability was patched in version 1.3.3.

criterions.comment: mono package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
